title: The DOJ’s Power Over The Netflix-WBD Deal Explained
full_text: The DOJ’s Power Over The Netflix-WBD Deal Explained. The Netflix-WBD deal is going through the US regulatory process, and it's the DOJ that has the power to block the merger. Here's how the federal agency can do so.. BURBANK, CALIFORNIA - DECEMBER 05: An aerial view of the Warner Bros. logo displayed on the water tower at Warner Bros.
